channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Judge finds Khalil misled DHS on immigration application; paves way for possible deportation

item.title: Britain unfurls lavish reception for Trump's second state visit
item.description: The British royal family treated President Trump and first lady Melania Trump to a spectacle of pomp at Windsor Castle for his historic second state v...

item.title: Trump designates Antifa as a 'major terrorist organization'
item.description: President Trump announced Wednesday night that he is designating the radical left-wing protest group Antifa as a "major terrorist organization."

item.title: Some U.S. deportees to Ghana say they are still held there, contradicting Ghanaian authorities
item.description: At least 11 of the 14 immigrants deported by the U.S. to Ghana are still being held in the West African nation, the deportees and their lawyers told T...

item.title: Jimmy Kimmel Blatantly Broke FCC Rules And Brendan Carr Was Right To Notice
item.description: Kimmel lied to his audience when he blamed the murder on the 'MAGA gang,' violating FCC regulations that prohibit news distortion or a hoax.

item.title: House Dems, four Republicans block Mace's censure resolution against Omar over Kirk comments
item.description: Rep. Nancy Mace's resolution to censure Rep. Ilhan Omar over her comments about assassinated conservative activist Charlie Kirk failed in a House vote...

item.title: Political Motive Is Relevant in Cases of Political Violence
item.description: An account of Charlie Kirk’s murder that ignores the victim, the perpetrator, and the motive is no account at all.

item.title: ABC News’ Matt Gutman Fabricates Quote To Make Alleged Kirk Assassin Look More ‘Touching,’ ‘Human’
item.description: The correspondent attributed a fabricated quote, ‘I want to protect you, my love,’ to soften the case against the reported assassin.

item.title: FBI Sources Alleged Biden Stopped Burisma Investigation ‘To Protect The Interests Of Hunter,’ New Docs Show
item.description: The outrageous connections described in these newly released documents scream to be fully explained to the American people.

item.title: BREAKING: Charlie Kirk Killer’s Motive Remains a Mystery
item.description: Experts don’t know what to make of the evidence.

item.title: Can We Finally Admit The T In LGBT Stands For Terrorism?
item.description: The perpetrators of these heinous tragedies and those who cheer them on couldn't be any clearer as to what their motivation is or who their targets ar...

item.title: Transgenderism vs. ‘Trans Ideology’: A Useful Distinction, No Matter What the Activist Class Says

item.title: Stop Asking Me To ‘Unify’ With The Violent Left
item.description: There can be no unity between good and evil. Somebody has to win this thing.

item.title: Why It Matters That Charlie Kirk’s Killer Came from the Left
item.description: Telling us that it doesn’t matter when one side commits violence warps public policy, news coverage, and more.

item.title: Pam Bondi’s First Amendment Follies
item.description: The attorney general’s statements get things wrong in an alarming way that suggests she doesn’t understand the basics of the U.S. Constitution.
